title: New features from Google make Android phones better wallet replacements
description: Your phone can replace lots of things you keep in your wallet, but not always elegantly. With new updates to its Wallet app, Google is trying to fix that.

title: Eating-disorder group’s AI chatbot gave weight loss tips, activist says
description: The National Eating Disorders Association suspended use of its Tessa chatbot after a complaint that it suggested taking body measurements and regular weigh-ins.
